overview: Bare Backin' In Red Square: Hardly seen in adult pictures before, is Moscow ready to be what Prague has become to gay porn? Is the old Soviet capital about to be the new Eastern Front for adult film-makers? It could be.Barebackin` on Red Square shreds the Iron Curtain forever, opening whole new vistas to adult audiences. The picture provides seductive glimpses into what was forbidden territory for Westerners. Better yet, viewers will see the men of Moscow are as great-looking as any place on earth. The fall of Communism seems better all the time!
title: Bare Backin`In Red Square
